#summary How to compile the adapter

= Prerequisite =

  # Java 6 or more. Can also be compiled on Java 5 but some code needs to be disabled (see IFDEF comments)
  # The adapter and its associated plugins requires Java libraries. They are all available [http://www.bedibin.com/devel/java-integration-adapter-libs.zip here]. Unzip the file in your home directery.

= Using provided make files =

Simply type "make" in svn repository.
